external_analysis_id.description: Unique ID for the external analysis or report

external_analysis_trigger.description: Trigger for the analysis, such as media reports or user complaints

external_analysis_link.description: Link to the detailed description and analysis of the incident

threat_actor_name.description: Name of the threat actor or entity involved in the incident

threat_actor_purpose.description: Purpose or objective of the threat actor in this incident

threat_actor_risks.description: Risks posed by the threat actor's actions, including ethical and social concerns

threat_actor_transparency.description: Aspects of transparency, governance, and marketing affected by the incident

organization_countries.description: Country or countries involved or affected by the incident

organization_sectors.description: Sector or sectors involved or affected by the incident

organization_operators.description: Operators or entities directly involved in the incident

organization_developers.description: Developers of the technology or tools exploited in the incident

vulnerability_system_names.description: Names of systems or technologies exploited or affected by the incident

vulnerability_technologies.description: Technologies involved in or affected by the incident

attribution_internal_harm_strategic_repu.description: Internal harm affecting strategic or reputational aspects

associated_topic.description: It is associated topic, which was generated based on K-means, algorithm
